title: President Obama, Drew Brees, Sheryl Underwood and more.
itunes:title: President Obama, Drew Brees, Sheryl Underwood and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve starts with singing Shirley's favorite quarantine song. Big Dog also has a friendly reminder for The Steve Harvey Nation. The killers of George Floyd have been charged. President Obama thanked protesters and had hopeful words for young African Americans. The Chief Love Officer has boredom, lack of consequences and Southern customs that he addresses, plus more. Drew Brees of The New Orleans Saints is under fire for his words. Our girl from The Talk had so much to get off her chest that she started cussing. Steve and the crew had some things to say regarding the Drew Brees situation and that is how we wrapped up today.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
